metadata.title: CVE-2023-4900 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Custom Tabs in Google Chrome on Androidprior to 117.0.5938.62 allowed a remote attacker to obfuscate a permissionprompt via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
